New Records: Olivier Giroud scored his 57th international goal for France, breaking a record as the country's all-time top scorer.
Key Match Events: France fell behind early with a goal by Marcelino Nunez after just 8 seconds.
Olivier Giroud scored the third goal for France, converting a chance created by Randal Kolo Muani.
Chile scored late with a goal by Dario Osorio.
Pre-Game Insights: France made several changes to their starting lineup, with Kylian Mbappé and Aurélien Tchouameni retained.
The match was France's first since their loss to Germany in a friendly match.
Post-Match Reflections: The win helped ease doubts about France's performance following their loss to Germany.
France's coach, Didier Deschamps, made nine changes to the starting lineup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jonathan Clauss and Eduardo Camavinga were forced off due to injuries during the first half.
France's victory came despite not having their first-choice squad.
